itemDescription: John Arbuthnott, KT CBE, DSC, 16th Viscount of Arbuthnott, Lord and Businessman (1924-2012)

wikipedia_page.main: John Campbell Arbuthnott, 16th Viscount of Arbuthnott,  (26 October 1924 – 14 July 2012) was a Scottish peer, Lord Lieutenant of Kincardineshire (1977–99) and a notable businessman.
